Player History
Signed as a free agent by California on 4/1/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $436,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/12/1985...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,834,286 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit on 8/15/1987, off Terry Forster (ATL)...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,057,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/27/1988 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,057,143 through salary arbitration...
9/26/1989: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $6,800,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1989...
Traded from New York (M) to San Diego on 2/6/1990 (Going to SD: P Bryan Harvey, P Alejandro Pena, P Roger Salkeld. Going to NYM: P Bob Milacki, 1B Jeff Conine, LF Ray Lankford)...
